ghclass 0.2.0.9000
  • Introduction
  • Reference
  • Change log

Retrieve information about GitHub Actions workflows and their runs.

Source: R/action.R, R/action_runs.R, R/action_status.R, and 1 more
action.Rd

  • action_workflows - retrieve details on repo workflows.

  • action_runs - retrieve details on repo workflow runs.

  • action_status - retrieve details on most recent workflow runs.

action_runs(repo, limit = 50)

action_status(repo, branch = NULL, before = NULL, limit = 50)

action_workflows(repo, full = FALSE)

Arguments

repo

Character. Address of repository in owner/name format.
limit

Numeric. Maximum number of workflow runs to return.
branch

Character. Vector of branches to report. Default NULL, returns all branches.
before

Datetime. Remove all runs created after this timestamp. Character values are converted using lubridate::ymd_hms().
full

Logical. Should all workflow columns be returned. Default FALSE.

Examples

# \dontrun{
action_workflows("rundel/ghclass")

#> # A tibble: 2 x 5
#>   name          id path                state badge_url                          
#>   <chr>      <int> <chr>               <chr> <chr>                              
#> 1 R-CMD-ch… 493339 .github/workflows/… acti… https://github.com/rundel/ghclass/…
#> 2 Render R… 493364 .github/workflows/… acti… https://github.com/rundel/ghclass/…

action_runs("rundel/ghclass")

#> # A tibble: 50 x 7
#>    name     branch   commit             event status  result created            
#>    <chr>    <chr>    <chr>              <chr> <chr>   <chr>  <dttm>             
#>  1 R-CMD-c… master   e194ada1b371d2102… push  comple… succe… 2020-12-18 13:19:55
#>  2 R-CMD-c… master   3d42f7caabeb45548… push  comple… succe… 2020-12-01 16:43:19
#>  3 R-CMD-c… master   e0fcbc2cffb134f38… push  comple… succe… 2020-11-30 11:48:52
#>  4 R-CMD-c… github_… d8db12141fe53a381… push  comple… failu… 2020-11-12 22:14:45
#>  5 R-CMD-c… github_… be816dd78ff19741b… push  comple… failu… 2020-11-12 22:14:07
#>  6 R-CMD-c… master   be816dd78ff19741b… push  comple… succe… 2020-10-17 23:01:15
#>  7 R-CMD-c… master   2710c94143ae10ac8… push  comple… succe… 2020-10-17 22:23:57
#>  8 R-CMD-c… master   7a9ec036bd01757ab… push  comple… succe… 2020-10-17 22:21:20
#>  9 R-CMD-c… master   3f07954ebe2bb6c5a… push  comple… succe… 2020-10-17 22:11:04
#> 10 R-CMD-c… master   545c74dfcc72426b9… push  comple… succe… 2020-10-15 23:17:14
#> # … with 40 more rows

action_status(c("rundel/ghclass", "rundel/parsermd"))

#> # A tibble: 9 x 5
#>   repo            name          branch         result  created            
#>   <chr>           <chr>         <chr>          <chr>   <dttm>             
#> 1 rundel/ghclass  R-CMD-check   master         success 2020-12-18 13:19:55
#> 2 rundel/ghclass  R-CMD-check   github_sitrep  failure 2020-11-12 22:14:45
#> 3 rundel/ghclass  R-CMD-check   gert_update    success 2020-10-07 11:57:42
#> 4 rundel/ghclass  R-CMD-check   master_to_main success 2020-09-23 11:09:59
#> 5 rundel/ghclass  R-CMD-check   peer_review    success 2020-08-26 14:43:41
#> 6 rundel/ghclass  R-CMD-check   usethis_to_cli success 2020-07-16 13:47:23
#> 7 rundel/ghclass  Render README master         success 2020-10-07 12:25:44
#> 8 rundel/ghclass  Render README peer_review    success 2020-08-26 14:43:41
#> 9 rundel/parsermd pkgdown       master         success 2020-12-14 14:17:49
# }
